traits.name: Guardian Aura
entries: Whenever a creature of Asteria's choice within 30 feet of her makes a saving throw, Asteria can give the creature advantage on the saving throw (no action required). This trait doesn't function if Asteria has the {@condition incapacitated} condition.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Asteria fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Asteria wears Winged Boots, which grant her a flying speed (included in her statistics). She also carries one half of a pair of Sending Stones; the other half of the pair is held by Euryale.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Asteria makes two Radiant Blade attacks and uses Bursting Benediction.

actions.name: Radiant Blade
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5 damage) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Bursting Benediction
entries: Asteria causes a burst of magical energy to envelop one creature she can see within 60 feet of herself. The target must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 (9d8 damage) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Asteria or another creature that she can see within 60 feet of herself then regains 10 hit points.

legendary.name: Brazen Strike
entries: Asteria makes one Radiant Blade attack.

legendary.name: Nimble Sprint
entries: Asteria moves up to her speed. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Asteria casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}):
